sys_script_include.name: SelectOnlyOpenOrders

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b36e51672fb03010d589d7492799b67b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_655585_whmg.SelectOnlyOpenOrders</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SelectOnlyOpenOrders</name><script><![CDATA[var SelectOnlyOpenOrders = Class.create();
SelectOnlyOpenOrders.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	checkOrders: function() {
		var isOpen;
		var id = this.getParameter("sysparm_id");
		var order = new GlideRecord('x_655585_whmg_order');
		order.addQuery('sys_id', id);
		order.query();
		order.next();
		if(order.status=='closed')
			isOpen=false;
		else
			isOpen=true;
		return isOpen;
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>marco.vella</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-23 10:18:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>b36e51672fb03010d589d7492799b67b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SelectOnlyOpenOrders</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Warehouse Management" source="x_655585_whmg">56e012ed2f303010d589d7492799b623</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Warehouse Management">56e012ed2f303010d589d7492799b623</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b36e51672fb03010d589d7492799b67b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>marco.vella</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-23 12:15:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
